Package com.gaminghub.app.business

Interface OrderItemsBusinessServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
OrderItemsBusinessService
public interface OrderItemsBusinessServiceInterface
Interface defining business operations related to order items.

  • Method Details

    • getOrderItems

      List<OrderItemModel> getOrderItems()
      Retrieves all order items.
      Returns:
      List of all OrderItemModel objects

    • getOrderItemsInRange

      List<OrderItemModel> getOrderItemsInRange(int limit, int offset)
      Retrieves a range of order items for pagination.
      Parameters:
      limit - Number of order items to retrieve
      offset - Number of order items to skip before starting retrieval
      Returns:
      List of OrderItemModel objects within the specified range

    • getOrderItemsByOrderId

      List<OrderItemModel> getOrderItemsByOrderId(int order_id)
      Retrieves all order items associated with a specific order ID.
      Parameters:
      order_id - The ID of the order whose items are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      List of OrderItemModel objects belonging to the specified order

    • getOrderItemById

      OrderItemModel getOrderItemById(int order_item_id)
      Retrieves a single order item by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      order_item_id - The ID of the order item to retrieve
      Returns:
      The OrderItemModel matching the ID, or null if not found

    • addOrderItem

      boolean addOrderItem(OrderItemModel orderItem)
      Adds a new order item.
      Parameters:
      orderItem - The OrderItemModel to add
      Returns:
      true if the order item was added successfully, false otherwise

    • updateOrderItem

      boolean updateOrderItem(OrderItemModel orderItem)
      Updates an existing order item.
      Parameters:
      orderItem - The OrderItemModel with updated information
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • deleteOrderItem

      boolean deleteOrderItem(int order_item_id)
      Deletes an order item by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      order_item_id - The ID of the order item to delete
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful, false otherwise

      Returns:
